title: Your Shop is open for business!

replies.body: My Shop is bugged i think, 6 champs that i dont even play ! Really wanted to spend some money
"i'll get you next time, Krunk1nator" {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
re-rolls maybe happening to the ones that got skins of champions not in there history? i just went and bought $50 of RP from ebgames and my Shop has no skins of champions i play
would be much obliged if this could be resolved to the many of us that it happened to :)

Same for me. I got skins for champs I don't play often. Some were played once or twice. For instance, I don't jungle but I got skins for two junglers I played in ARAM. For the two mids I got, I don't play them often nowadays. Only one skin that I got that I would actually consider getting and it has so low of a discount it's not worth considering. I'm highly disappointed

I was hoping for exactly one skin... Butcher Urgot. Got it. Please tell that Discountbot he did a great job.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i don't want him to get complacent
Mine isn't there...
I'm right here.
HA!
I'm not buying any of those skins, half of those are from champs I only played in aram and one for all games. The system should only look at the games where I choosed to play a certain champion plz.
this, i got champs i dont even play XD
where is my shop?
icon on the top bar, next to crafting

No, that's where the Your Shop is.
Dude clearly wants to know where the My Shop is located.
disappointed in this discount bot, was expecting skins from champs i play, i got 1 skin for a champ i play in ranked, 1 from normals but i already have skins for both them
i will yell at the bot for this
troll

It's a little bit annoying that every time Riot puts out Your Shop, it's always not working properly at first. What's even more so annoying this time is how many people got terrible skins for champions they don't play, yet the single Rioter replying to comments isn't even leaving any useful information about the problem nor doing anything to resolve it.
Riot continues getting more and more greedy within the past two years all of a sudden and it's quite distasteful; for a company that prides itself on communication with its playerbase, Rito sure dropped the ball mega hard this season.
I played 16 Nunu games in a row and got 0 Nunu skins.
im literally gonna try the same thing
All of the champs is i got in the the shop are good but they are perma banned in ranked and draft like wtf discount bot {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

My shop sucks can I have yours?
I just came here to read all of Bilby's responses. I was not disappointed.
thanks! cool frog icon
But it's a duck...

> [{quoted}](name=Seto Ka1ba,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=Hsk7Pi5v,comment-id=008d00000000,timestamp=2018-08-17T20:51:41.527+0000)

Lol I think I can tell the difference between a frog and a duck

Hard reset on shops please. Horrible time to do a personal shop in my opinion. Just after One For All scrambles our match history. What was the thought process here? That's not even a full excuse for the selection I got. I haven't played zed since I bought him years ago; but I got him ONCE in the rotating game mode and I guess that's enough to get him in.. Don't know what went wrong with this shop.
I actually got every skin that I have wanted on discount for champions I play all the time, kudos riot you  did a good job!
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Tell the bot he did well for me. All the skins were lovely. I got four of them. (and thank you Mr bot I've been wanting reaper Soraka for awhile now.) :3

Praise the Card Shop! I managed to get star guardian Janna at last! I've had my eye on getting her one day but bam a miracle happened and I managed to get her. For only 540! What a steal.
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
My Shop is like a Bullshit{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
please no
I got a skin in my shop that I just got yesterday for full price lol...
You can't get skins you already own but okay.
Generally no, but if it was just purchased yesterday, I wouldn't put it past the bot to be a little glitchy.
i love u discountbot, i was sad because diana skins never go on sale and your shop gave me 60% off blood moon diana. {{champion:131}}  thanks bro

I've been here for 4 "My Shop" events. Those 4 event's I bought all 6 skins available because they were ALL champs I played and were ALL 50% or MORE off.

This time I only get skins for 2 champs I play and the discount is only 30% they are older cheap skins.
I was so excited to get home to find out what I was going to throw money at but I won't bet getting ANY of the shity bad discount skins 4 of which are champs I don't even play.

I was REALLY REALLY hoping for one of the 3 Sona skins I don't have since I've played her about 50 games in 6 days as a 80% one trick Sona but nope.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I'm sad can I get a reroll like in ARAM lmao
Discountbot is wrong. Those Tahm Kench nerfs were unnecessary.
I don't even see my shop LMAO
It gave me champions i dont even play??

Can I make a proposition for the next time this features go live?

I currently have all purchasable skin + the vault one, so I have no shop at all.

Considering I still miss some stuff like ward/icon/chroma, is there a way to proc a "shop bis" with that kind of content who only appear if you are not elligible for the skin feature?
